name: tree-sitter-eu4mod
description: Global parser for Europa Universalis IV grammar syntax.
author: Richard ANDRIAN - Coyote-31 <coyotepouil@gmail.com>

scripts.gt-gfx: tree-sitter generate && npm test && tree-sitter parse test/private/gfx/* --quiet --time
scripts.gt-gui: tree-sitter generate && npm test && tree-sitter parse test/private/gui/* --quiet --time
scripts.gt-yml: tree-sitter generate && npm test && tree-sitter parse test/private/yml/* --quiet --time
scripts.gtb: tree-sitter generate && npm test && node-gyp build
